放射线和免疫疗法有助于保护肌肉侵入性膀胱癌患者的膀胱根据ImmunopReserve Clinical临床试验的结果，患有辐射加上放射线加上免疫检查点抑制剂（ICIS）杜瓦卢马布（IMJUDO）的免疫检查点抑制剂（ICIS）的局部肌肉侵入性膀胱癌（MIBC）的患者具有持久的反应，可保存膀胱持续的反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/radiation-and-radiation-and-mmunotherapy-help-preserve-bladders-bladders-bladders-ing-patients-with-muscle-muscle-invasive-bladder-cancer.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250218/radiation-and-radiation-and-mmunotherapy-help-preserve-bladders-bladders-bladders-ing-patients-with-muscle-muscle-invasive-bladder-bladder-cancer.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=90029de1-d4c0-4ff5-9771-d8a8ae55555cf84 Tue, 18 Feb 2025 21:48:08 -0500 Radiation and immunotherapy help preserve bladders in patients with muscle-invasive bladder cancer
